website_summaries.verdict: These kid-proof placemats are perfect for parents looking to sneak in a little education along with the veggies.
pros: Set of four placemats includes educational prints of the body, solar system, world, and USA
Specially designed by teachers to help kids learn the basics in a fun manner
Stands out for its non-slip backing that won't slide around the table
cons: Understandably, the print on the world map is a little small

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the educational elements
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually disappointed with these. They seemed so cute, but they're not great educationally. I do like their "function" as non-slip place mats, but their educational aspects are lacking. The planets are not to scale, the body parts don't seem to be either, the world map is lackluster, and US map has really strange images on each state. I wanted to like them! We will still use them because, as I said, they're functional, but I wish they were cuter and had better material printed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily CTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic placemats – educational and fun. Many uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two-year-old granddaughter because I use them in an educational manner. You can see how I do that in my video. I like these particular ones because they are durable and I can clean them before she eats. They are very easy to clean using a wipe or a cloth. The back of them is fantastic because it does not move around on the table (unlike most educational placemats). They are also good for using with modeling clay or crafts. These would be a great gift for anyone with a child or special needs adult!
customer_reviews.author: Vee Ess

customer_reviews.title: Cute Design, Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved these placemats, and most importantly my kids loved them. I like the thickness and the colorful, educational designs. HOWEVER, we have been using them for a few weeks now and they are already showing considerable wear. They scratch easily, and the nonstick grip and pictures are already wearing off. I wish I could recommend them, but these just aren't worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: JCoon

customer_reviews.title: Cute, educational, easy to clean, bright colors, anti-slip on back.
customer_reviews.text: These have been great conversation starters for our four year old and the fam at dinner time. We've been playing games, like, Which sense would you use to find stinky cheese? etc. He's not a reader yet, so, while some of the text is very small on the global map, it's not really an issue. These are a great intro to geography as a concept. And, they look nice on the table and wipe down easily. They have sticky-ish rubber dots all over the back, so, they're non-slip on the table. A very important feature! I'd get another set in a different theme as his interests evolve.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great designs, questionable accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Love the designs and durability. Some changes could make them awesome: The capitals are in the wrong place in some states ... seems just as easy to locate them accurately. The planets are odd colors ... again, it seems just as easy to make those more indicative of the planet. (earth is purple and blue, for example). A lot of the text is so tiny on the world map that it’s illegible with the coating. Overall, a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: appymac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant about ordering these. I had an older version of a laminated placemat (different company) that slid around and wasn't big enough. It caused more frustration than anything. We homeschool and have a hand built table in our kitchen. The size is perfect for both my kids, ages 6 and 10 yrs old. The materials on the Explorer sets work great for both ages as well. The mats don't slide around and wipe down easily. I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brandi M.

customer_reviews.title: Had food all over them when I opened the box
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality of the item is fine. And that is the only reason it got more than one star. These mats clearly came used. There was food smeared all over them and they were disgusting. If I pay $22 for something, it should not come in such a gross state. I feel bad for my daughter who was excited to use these right out of the box. Nasty.
customer_reviews.author: ring6992

customer_reviews.title: Great for mealtime engagement w/kid
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 3 year old to keep her in her seat during meals. She would take one bite of her dinner and run off to play. Now, she stays engaged and asks about all the different things on each placemat: body parts, planets, US geography, etc. I love that she stays in her seat and practices good habits like making conversation with us about her observations.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Non stick stuff washes off. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t pretty horrible. They work fine for the first few washes but after quite a few, the stuff that makes them not slide get washed off and then they are just flimsy plastic things that arise all over the table. The pattern also gets washed off easily and I’m not agreedively cleaning these either. They have fun designs and they’re a good size but they’re no good after a few washes. Don’t waste your money and go find other ones that will actually last.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Westling

customer_reviews.title: I love the place mats
customer_reviews.text: I love the place mats! My 5yr old son is learning the continents at school so he enjoys staring at the placemats while eating. He looks at it daily and is not bored by it. The maps reiterrates what he is learning at school. He already can identify all the continents and locates many of the different states. I also love how they have liberty bell and statue of liberty in PA and NY, now that gives us more cool things to explore.
customer_reviews.author: L.Hab

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for Mom
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old really likes them. I was disappointed though. Many major countries are nearly impossible to see. I had to use a magnifying glass. The planet Earth is odd colors. The human body chart is missing the lymphatic system. A few more things as well. For a 2 year old, it's fine. I wouldn't recommend it past 5. It wasn't anti slip either.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I loved the table mats and my twin grandsons loved them ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the table mats and my twin grandsons loved them they are 7 years old. The mats are very informative and they read them and swap them with each other when they sit down to eat. One reads about the stars & one shares info regarding the states & the world. Because it included 4 mats they change mats each time they sit down to eat. I bought them to keep at my house when they visit but they loved them so much they wanted to take them home so I think I will have to purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: curtis cooper

customer_reviews.title: They are not Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for about 2 months and all of them look like this. They are completely plastic which I wanted because ya know it’s for kids. But this bends every time you clean them. I didn’t put them in a dishwasher or submerge them in water. I may have gotten “faulty” ones. Now they have to go in the trash because there’s no way to fix them with damaging them.
customer_reviews.author: Taliah

customer_reviews.title: Anti-Skid Backing
customer_reviews.text: These seem much thicker than the cartoon character placemats they are replacing in our home. I like the texture and weight of them, but I’m still adjusting to the antislide backing. We’re used to stacking and sliding them before and after meals and these definitely have some traction. Would probably be great on a slick table though. We love the educational opportunity these present; we had an amazing family discussion when they were first used. I’m happy with my purchase and would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Princess BoB

customer_reviews.title: Design and info worn off in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought some placemats for $1 at Target and wanted to replace them with something sturdier and new educational info for our kids. These lasted about 2 months before everything from the front was scratched off and pointless. Our $1 placements lasted for over 2 years and still look better. We plan to contact customer service for this issue. They are easy to clean... but by 3 mo tag they will just be a piece of plastic 🙁! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: HVK

customer_reviews.title: Better than watching TV!
customer_reviews.text: My children grew up with placemats like thee. that was 30 years ago and they still talk about how they learned the state capitals and contras in Africa while eating lunch or dinner. I bought a set for each of my grandchildren. They can be conversation starters or simply something to study alone or to use to quiz siblings while eating. A good substitute for always having the TV on during meals.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Misspellings
customer_reviews.text: Delaware is not spelled "Delawere". The capital of North Dakota should be Bismarck, not “Bismark.” This was obviously not made in the USA, nor by people who understand the subject matter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boot

customer_reviews.title: Multiple spelling errors...
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good, concept is great. And then we found a spelling error. Maybe one and I let it go. But then we started looking more closely and found another. And another. And another. Totally unacceptable for "educational" products to have spelling errors. I can post pictures for any skeptics out there. Hope the company can resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love educational placemats, and I love that it keeps them entertained while eating. They definitely learn with these. Pros: Great print quality Awesome facts Slip resistant backing Easy to clean Durable Stay flat Cons: Scrubbing will remove the printing, so be gentle Surface is a bit porous, so marker/pencil/crayon may be harder to remove
customer_reviews.author: Duh Slacks

customer_reviews.title: Great Educational Dinner Conversation!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love these! At dinner they are always asking us questions about what state is what, where we live, where relatives live, about planets, and many other things. It is a great way to have conversation at the dinner table and the kids are excited to learn. Great buy and worth the money for everything that they are learning. Very nice backing so they do not slide around on the table too, easy to clean when sauce has gotten on them.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline C

customer_reviews.title: This was a hit at the table
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that this set of placemats were going to be so sensational at the table. As soon as they were in place and the plates we were set on them the uproar began ( all in good fun) the plates we were set aside and the learning began. I'm going to buy others topics, if available.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: US Map is Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The Upper Peninsula of Michigan is missing from the map on the USA placement. The picture on the selling page has it. We returned one set expecting the replacement to match the selling page. Amazon was quick to process the return and we a replacement very quickly. Unfortunately, the replacement has the same defect -- part of a state is missing from the map. Since we want to use this as a learning tool for our grandson, we were disappointed to find it didn't match the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great placemats
customer_reviews.text: After my toddler fell down getting down from the table yet again because of a slipping placemat I tried these and they work great. The bottom is grippy when you push down, but doesn't stick to the table when I need to get it up. The front is easy to clean and haven't gotten stained, even by tomato sauce. Very good quality product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your kid won't eat, buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Very educational. It was so hard to get my 3.5 year old to the table to eat, now it's no problem! She picks out which one she wants for the meal and she will actually ask questions and look at it while eating. These are awesome. So easy to clean and actually does stick to the table. I was worried at first because they don't really feel like non slip backing but it works great. Even my 1 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Casey

customer_reviews.title: More durability please
customer_reviews.text: These placemats were used almost every day for six months. At this point, the rubber backing has mostly worn off. The pictures on the front are fading or distorted. We hand washed these, never in the dishwasher. I would have expected more durability for the price. I bought these again..the anti-slip wears off too quickly. If you wash them regularly, they will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Vivekanand Chivukula

customer_reviews.title: Mom and kid appoved!
customer_reviews.text: We love these placemats! My kids (12 and 10) instantly started to talk about the solar system - even started a lively debate about Pluto being a planet! It was great to talk about something educational without them realizing it! The placemats are flexible without being too thin. Colors are great and the text is very easy to read. They stick to the table well and clean up is easy. We will be ordering more placemats from merka.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer7993

customer_reviews.title: Perfect placemats for us
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for place mats for my children, and read reviews of so many different kinds before choosing these. I am glad I did. They are the perfect size, they don't slip around the table, and they are easily cleaned. My children love to look at the images and lots of interesting conversations result from their questions. We love these!
customer_reviews.author: Golobolbol

customer_reviews.title: It's a win win scenario
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mom of 5 kids. Having a placemat that is both entertaining, educational, and efficient...is my jam. I especially liked the grip bottom so that when I place their food on the placemat, it's not sliding all over the table, causing spills and messes, as they put their hands on the placemat or table or food dishes. Their food stays in place. And I liked the designs. With the 4 pack, my kids like picking out either solar system, world map, usa map or their body placemat to be entertained or learn something while they eat. Win-Win for sure!
customer_reviews.author: IamAmom

customer_reviews.title: Kids learn while they wait
customer_reviews.text: Prep dinner while kids learn. Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner. A total of 15 minutes daily of looking and learning. 5 min, before breakfast, 5 min, before lunch, 5 min. before dinner. Bought 12 to pick from.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Great Except for Planet Colors
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall style and design. However...the colors are deliberately inaccurate. Since when in the Earth blue and purple??? Why is Jupiter brown and Venus red? Mercury shouldn't be brown either and Saturn is the wrong color too. I get that it's not a real photo...but I would prefer colors that are more realistic. I do really like the maps. They are vibrant and have fun looking pictures. Overall I do like these. At the very least my son isn't too bothered by the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Education & Functional!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased more for an educational measure rather than a functional one. They are very easy to clean up and super sturdy (think flimsy, but not destructible.) The educational content on them is great - body systems, solar system, states & capitals, and a map of the world/countries. These are a great and fun learning tool.. it's even taught me a thing or two. :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Bent but still nice
customer_reviews.text: They came in the mail with a bend. All 4 have a slight U shape that is just not going away. I've tried putting weights on it and rolling it up in the other direction. I'm rolling it every morning so far to see if eventually it will lay flat. Otherwise very nice and I like all the designs. They're fun conversation starters with children who are old enough to read :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily Javan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Our 2.5 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: You can never teach your child too much, particularly when he or she is young and the mind is a sponge. These are perfect for making even meals a learning opportunity. That there are four choices is perfect to keep things new each day.
customer_reviews.author: ehkay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great products we use half at our house and half at my daughters. Grandson ask question and is able to find the state where we live. We used a set like these for our kids when they were little. They knew all the states and their capitals long be for it was ever required in school.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and easy to clean. There are 4 different designs which is great for multiple kids or alternating which ones you use with your kids. They can learn about the body anatomy, space, continents and the states that make up the US.
customer_reviews.author: ambermichellebrown17

customer_reviews.title: Best Placemats I've seen! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Here's what I like about these: -They don't slip. Very helpful when my 1 year old reaches on the table and tries to grab everything- he now doesn't get the placemats and therefore spill his brother's food everywhere. -They not laminated, so it won't peel up and get ruined after washing. Seems a lot more durable than others I've owned. -great pictures, that are simple and easy for kids to look at and understand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had a few old worn out kids placemats that I wanted to replace (they were pretty beat up from years of play dough, slime, meals, etc.) These placemats are great. They’re educational, durable, have vibrant colors, are easy to clean, and I LOVE the no slip backing on them so they don’t slide all over my dining room table.
customer_reviews.author: TeaTime

customer_reviews.title: Educational
customer_reviews.text: I like the educational factor. My children had similar ones when they were young and these are more colorful, they don't slide around, and it has sparked interest in the solar system and human body for my 5&6 yo grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (4 and 8) love these place-mats! My daughter, especially, loves them as she is learning about anatomy and states in her current curriculum!
customer_reviews.author: MMK

customer_reviews.title: Great product for toddler
customer_reviews.text: The product is seems durable. We switch the placemat in regular basis and my 2.5 year old already know half of the states and most body parts.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: they feel like they may outlast their need which is a pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: So, I have to say this company asked me for a review when I first purchased these I thought a review for a placemat was a bit silly. However after 5 years of laminated kids mattes peeling apart, the durability of these feels actually inspired. They are simple, solid, don't slip, don't create that suction between the table and the mat and most importantly, they feel like they may outlast their need which is a pretty big technological accomplishment for a 2 dimensional, educational, table protector.
customer_reviews.author: sevrin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality placemats
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had them a week or so but these seem great. They clean up easy and don’t look like they’re going to curl or warp, and my 6yo absolutely loves them and all the info on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like them but...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them. They are educational and fun. I just wish they were holding up better. The picture is already coming off their favorite one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line!
customer_reviews.text: Great for table talk with 2 & 3 year old. We wanted to get a jump on several subjects and there are simple pictures up to more descriptive info for the kids as they grow older. These mats look to last the duration after a couple weeks of intense wiping not a hint of fading unlike others we’ve encountered. Well made and informative a must have for the family 👏📚👍
customer_reviews.author: N2Style

customer_reviews.title: Cool & Educational
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and learns a lot while eating his meals (just don't tell him he is learning). I recommend the higher quality of this brand over the cheaper laminated versions (which fall apart if any water gets in between the layers of laminate). I expect these to last for several years and hopefully a couple more kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa L Taecker

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These are great placemats. I did not have any of the issues that some of the other reviewers had. The colors are bright. The printing is well-defined, and the characters are fine on the maps. The kids enjoy them and like having their own placemats.
customer_reviews.author: GeoTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These placemates are durable and easy to clean. My daughter loves them. Instead of playing with her food, now we look at maps, how the body works and the solar system. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Boston

customer_reviews.title: So much better that cloth placemats for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I replaced my nice, cloth placemats with these for the kiddos! They love them, and they are durable and educational. I should have bought these long ago!
customer_reviews.author: Beka

customer_reviews.title: Screen Free Mealtime Activity!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! My son has fun choosing a theme for mealtime and it’s great for conversation during those “screen free” times. I docked one star for sturdiness as my 1 year old grabbed one out of the box and bent it, leaving a fold mark/dent on it. Would love a rollable/foldable travel version!
customer_reviews.author: toronto

customer_reviews.title: Very good set of educational placemats for kids
customer_reviews.text: Very good set of educational placemats for kids. The placemats are nonslip due to tiny grips on the underside. The only thing that keeps me from giving five stars is that one of the placemats is missing about 1/3 of the non slip grips, but it is still usable. The other three mats are do not have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Greatest Story

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and Fun Maps
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old grandson just loved these mats. He wanted them on his wall. He loves looking at them and explaining what they are all about to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M Clough

customer_reviews.title: Good for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my three year old, I love the non slip on the back, easy to wipe down, large, and colorful. I do wish they went in to a little more detail but they’re what I excepted from reading the product description.
customer_reviews.author: UnPocoLoco

customer_reviews.title: Don't order the one with the world map.
customer_reviews.text: Don't order the one with the world map. As it is mostly useless. The image used did not resize the name of the countries, so they are so tiny it's impossible to read. It might work for a wall size map, but for a place mat it doesn't. The other three mats are good.
customer_reviews.author: cesar

customer_reviews.title: I like them for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughters, it is never too early to learn... I have not had a chance to use them yet so I can’t review them, but I was disappointed in the size of the print on the word map . The words are so tiny it will take a magnifying glass to read them which will make it harder to teach from them. They are anti slip and look easy to clean , they could be a little thicker. I think other than the small print they will work.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great pack of placemats
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! My kids love it. The underside has a grippy texture so the mats don’t slide on the table. 10/1o
customer_reviews.author: TessMess87

customer_reviews.title: Great product/kids love
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! These are very well made and really don’t move on my table. My kids actually fight over which one they want. It also inspires my 4 year old to ask me questions about where we live and the anatomy of the body.
customer_reviews.author: Inglish Short

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them. Stimulates educational discussion. Just a great educational idea for kids learning about the subjects.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Durable and washable!
customer_reviews.text: Wipe clean too and non slip bottom! Easy to read and learn while you eat. My 5 year loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful educational tool
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and easy to clean. They are great educational tools for even little ones. Bought for 2 year-old.
customer_reviews.author: MGZ

customer_reviews.title: Better than my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Even better in person- fantastic quality. My 5-y/o son is much more engaged and excited to learn than I could have hoped for. We have a lot of teachers in our family, and education is a very high priority. We have looked for these at specialty toy shops and educational stores, but this is by far the best I’ve found. I am very impressed with the product and will be back for more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! Nice sturdy material, textured on the back so they don't slip around and brightly colored.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect parties on the president placement (Jefferson was not a Whig!)
customer_reviews.text: The political parties of all Whig and Democratic-Republican presidents seem to have been switched. COME ON GUYS. EVERYONE KNOWS the Whigs were a reaction to Andrew Jackson's king-like administration, so OBVIOUSLY they couldn't show up until after his election. HOW WILL MY CHILD LEARN ABOUT THE PROUD, ANTI-FEDERALIST, JEFFERSONIAN HISTORY OF THE DEMOCRATIC-REPUBLICANS?!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Thomalla

customer_reviews.title: Placemats are great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't even looking for placemats, but went off of another person's recommendation. I really like the quality, they're very light weight and thin, also very colorful! I love the resistance factor with the non-slip grip on the back, and it actually is very easy to wipe off. I'm hoping my boys will love these as much as I do, and hope to get other varieties in the future, thanks for a great product :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stenelli

customer_reviews.title: Kids like the different colors and information
customer_reviews.text: The grand kids really enjoy the placemats and read from different ones to chose the one they want when they eat their meal.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what we wanted, something that the kids could use underneath their artwork so that the table surface doesn't get ruined. The non slip surface is great as well. The fact that they have educational artwork on them is icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: P. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: These are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Much for durable than I expected. The material is super sturdy, wipe clean easily, and the kids LOVE using them for messy activities and dinner. They have a rubber backing so they don't move on the countertop which is great! Would definitely purchase again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl non-slip placemats
customer_reviews.text: Theses are vinyl placemats. They are somewhat educational but have blurry font on the USA capitals. Not the best quality for the money but I will use them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Good conversation starters
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Five and three year old love them. Conversation pieces at dinner. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: this is still a great set of placemats for her
customer_reviews.text: Even though our daughter is only two, this is still a great set of placemats for her. She loves the colorful pictures and is constantly making connections with the images she sees to pictures in her books. The construction is great, it can't be pierced like the laminated variety we've had before, the image looks to be protected from being scratched off, and there is a nice skid-prof surface on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan gabel

customer_reviews.title: Love these placemats
customer_reviews.text: Fun, functional learning placemats. My boys (2 &6) love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jackee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: They stay on the table without slipping around, they get the kids to talk about learning, and they're easy to clean. Good product, worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Damo

customer_reviews.title: A must have for homeschooling & unschooling
customer_reviews.text: Great learning tool!! We don’t even mention the info but sometimes our son talks to us about it which is super exciting!!! I try to play it cool and not bombard him with info.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Learning at Dinner
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in addition to the math ones. These were for the kids to help them learn while eating. I highly recommend these mats very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CoastinG

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, grip in the back. Easy for even a 4 year old to understand yet educational even for me!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: accidental learning
customer_reviews.text: we use these placemats with our three grandkids who are staying with us for a year. They are great conversation starters the kids are constantly testing each other they have already asked if they can keep them when they move (they are military kids)
customer_reviews.author: Alice M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! My 3 y/o is infatuated with each one, especially the one with the world. These are so fun to use as learning resources and provide conversation at the dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: nurse

customer_reviews.title: Do not dishwash.
customer_reviews.text: We love the place mats. Too bad my husband thought they were dishwasher safe. Needless to say we have just ordered a replacement set for the ones he dishwashed. (Dishwashing causes them to curl)
customer_reviews.author: Natascha S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: High-quality product. And appreciate that the print is not topically-applied, so it appears to be fade-resistent [which is an issue I have had with other plastic kids mats]
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: ... about the world around us so these placemats are great to keep her entertained and learning while eating
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5 and very curious about the world around us so these placemats are great to keep her entertained and learning while eating.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Baggiano

customer_reviews.title: COLORFUL & WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loves them - Whether he's eating or just names the planets or 50 states. This was a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: Cute but missing the UP
customer_reviews.text: Cute placemats, only upper Michigan is missing which is too bad since I wanted to show our kiddo where my family is from.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These placemats are awesome!! They are a great size, the grip on the bottom is great and they are SO easy to clean! I bought the Explorer Set and my boys love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: They make great educational pieces
customer_reviews.text: My son loves looking at these! They make great educational pieces, but are also wonderful for eating and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Educational & Informative for Kids and Parents!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent customer service! Our kids love the placemats, especially with all of the colorful and artistic designs. We love it because it allows us to talk about the maps, solar system, or body while we are eating at the table. Education is extremely vital, especially at an early age, and these placemats make it interesting and fun! Thanks again for such an awesome product! Mommy and Daddy give it two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Starkey

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves these placemats
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple weeks with these placemats and my 2.5yo daughter asks by name for the placemat of her choice each night. She walks around talking about the Solar System and Body systems and can now even point to all the locations in the country and world where we have family.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Abramson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic educational placemats!
customer_reviews.text: These placemats are nice and thick, really great quality. What’s even more impressive, is the accuracy of the information on them and the simplicity of how it is portrayed. I bought these for my kids 8 and 4, but find myself(and my husband) poring over the maps and learning some new things too! All in all, a fantastic purchase and well worth the money. Will purchase different ones in the future again. Thank you Merka!
customer_reviews.author: TeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Substantial material, interesting information for my grandchildren to look at while waiting at the table.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love the non stick back! My son loves to find things to ask us about during dinner from the placemats. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: These placemats arrived in perfect shape, well packaged. Colorful and interesting. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Otter

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect even though the brand is not well known
customer_reviews.text: I looked at so many stupid options for placemats and we are thrilled with these. My daughter gets excited to use the different versions of them so she can learn about different topics. They have a unique type of no-skid rubber bottom that works well on my dining table, and the plastic is thick and great quality and cleans well. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Stone

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-clean cute placemats for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for my messy toddler - and the detail is nice (learning at mealtimes!)
customer_reviews.author: Ellie486

customer_reviews.title: Missing half of Michigan
customer_reviews.text: Love these except the USA map is missing part of Michigan. The Upper Peninsula isn’t represented on the map. That’s a huge chuck of the state. Otherwise it’s great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. Just wish it had a non-labelled side ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Just wish it had a non-labelled side so the kids would test their memory and name the states and countries without seeing the labels.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Dickert

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome! My four year old daughter loves the pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon originally sent me the wrong product and I had to go through the hassle of returning them. However, I reordered the placemats and got the right ones. They are awesome! My four year old daughter loves the pictures and we had a great conversation about places in the world over dinner tonight. The no slip backing is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lund

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are durable and don't fade like other placemats. They create great dinner conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these placemats for my five-year-old grandson, and he loved them. He especially liked the maps. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JeanD

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a little inaccurate lol
customer_reviews.text: Hahaha on the map of the world the “maple leaf” in Canada is actually a weed leaf. I haven’t checked the facts on any other mats in this set yet. They also don’t lay flat well even though they are nice and thick
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Muffett

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them
customer_reviews.text: The kids were really excited to see the place mats and couldn't decide which one they liked the best
customer_reviews.author: Diane Williams

customer_reviews.title: Top quality is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality will not delaminate. Accurate and engaging visuals easy to clean. Best placemat I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Denton

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Colorful Learning Experience
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9yr old and a 5yr old and they both love these placemats. They were so excited when the package came and instantly decided which one they wanted. They are very colorful and educational at the same time. I didn't know that Pluto was no longer considered a planet, until my darling children informed me after I looked at the Solar System mat. This will help them stay engaged in the learning process and encourage fun at the same time. Our 9yr old is getting a jump start on learning the 50 states, and their capitol cities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: merka Kids Placemats Educational Placemat Non Slip Explorer Set Solar System Human Body USA World Map
feature_bullets: MEALTIME WITH YOUR TODDLER HAS BEEN REINVENTED Wouldn't you love to have your child learning while they eat, feed their hungry brains with new concepts, and become better students? Then you'll love how merka's Placemats for dining table leverages dinner time to serve brain-food learning materials to quickly and easily help you get them learning while having dinner. Just place our mat on your dinner table and watch their minds grow!

KIDS PLACEMATS NON SLIP BACK We have kids and we know how important this is! Tired of constantly cleaning food off the floor after they push the placemat and plate off the table? Well, we fixed that. Our table placemats have silicone suction back that prevents accidents on the table. You’re welcome ;)

REUSABLE AND DURABLE Wipe clean our plastic placemats with a damp cloth. High-quality polymer with UV color printing and high quality materials make our place mats for kitchen table last longer than our competition. We care about our environment so our placemats for kids are not disposable they are reusable and recyclable.
BPA FREE Our main concern is health and safety. Our table mats for kids are made of premium quality, 100% safe plastic.

AMAZING LEARNING TOOL Support your toddler learning using our Montessori educational placemats as learning resources for your kid. Have your children learn while eating with these educational mats developed to bring your two year old kindergarten preschool toddler or baby learn about letters colors shapes and numbers also makes a great speech therapy material and Montessori toys for toddlers.
